Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DAC_CURRENT_OPT

Current option in DAC configuration option.

Enumerator:
DAC_MAX_CURRENT_700uA  The settling time of the DAC is 1 us max, and the maximum current is 700 uA
DAC_MAX_CURRENT_350uA  The settling time of the DAC is 2.5 us and the maximum current is 350 uA
